name: Erin Hannon
quotes: Well, you know what my middle name is? Rajnigandha! And I hate it!
How many freaking vampires am I supposed to care about these days?
When you're a receptionist, you're the face of the office. And who has a better face than me?
If I had to, I could clean out my desk in five seconds, and nobody would ever know I had been here.
